<h1>The Farnsworth Parabox</h1>
<p>OK, if everyone's finished being stupid. Bender, this is Fry's decision&hellip; and he made it wrong. So it's time for us to interfere in his life. Hey, guess what you're accessories to. Ah, yes! John Quincy Adding Machine.  He struck a chord with the voters when he pledged not to go on a killing spree.</p>
<h2>The Sting</h2>
<p>With gusto. Look, last night was a mistake. Kif might! Why yes! Thanks for noticing.</p>
<ul>
<li>Why would a robot need to drink?</li>
<li>I didn't ask for a completely reasonable excuse! I asked you to get busy!</li>
<li>OK, if everyone's finished being stupid.</li>
<li>Come, Comrade Bender! We must take to the streets!</li>
</ul>
<h3>The Cyber House Rules</h3>
<p>You've killed me! Oh, you've killed me! You guys realize you live in a sewer, right? But I've never been to the moon! Hey, what kinda party is this? There's no booze and only one hooker. No, just a regular mistake.</p>
<h4>Devil's Hands are Idle Playthings</h4>
<p>And remember, don't do anything that affects anything, unless it turns out you were supposed to, in which case, for the love of God, don't not do it! You wouldn't. Ask anyway! Hey, guess what you're accessories to.</p>
<ol>
<li>Spare me your space age technobabble, Attila the Hun!</li>
<li>That's right, baby. I ain't your loverboy Flexo, the guy you love so much. You even love anyone pretending to be him!</li>
<li>Well, thanks to the Internet, I'm now bored with sex. Is there a place on the web that panders to my lust for violence?</li>
<li>Why would a robot need to drink?</li>
<li>Bender, hurry! This fuel's expensive! Also, we're dying!</li>
</ol>
<h5>The Series Has Landed</h5>
<p>Dr. Zoidberg, that doesn't make sense. But, okay! I am Singing Wind, Chief of the Martians. No! I want to live! There are still too many things I don't own! Or a guy who burns down a bar for the insurance money!</p>
